mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Estates of two firms partners now deceased: J.L. Howard and P.L. Howard
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Estates of two firms partners now deceased: J.L. Howard and P.L. Howard The firms were J.L. and P.L. Howard and P.L. Howard and Co. W.L. Howard, Administrator of the estate of P.L. Howard H.S. Howard, Administrator of the estate of P. L. Howard Recorded in Ledger Book 4, Page 416-418, in the Floyd County Courthouse.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
